data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Awdal, Somalia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 82,888 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Awdal, Somalia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Awdal to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Awdal, Somalia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 6,908 neighbors who are far from you in Awdal. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Midgan people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Awdal to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Awdal, Somalia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Awdal, Somalia has a population of 82,900.

We estimate Awdal has 12 people who might know Jesus, 237 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82,651 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,908 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Awdal, Somalia.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
